headline.print_headline: Biden, Poroshenko Concerned About Russia Military Buildup: White House
headline.main: Biden, Poroshenko Concerned About Russia Military Buildup: White House

docs.snippet: U.S. Vice President Joe Biden and Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko discussed their concerns on Wednesday about Russian military forces amassing on the Ukrainian border, the White House said....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Vice President Joe Biden and Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko discussed their concerns on Wednesday about Russian military forces amassing on the Ukrainian border, the White House said.

headline.print_headline: Mississippi GOP Won't Hear Challenge to Cochran
headline.main: Mississippi GOP Won't Hear Challenge to Cochran

docs.snippet: Mississippi's Republican Party on Wednesday refused to hear challenger Chris McDaniel's effort to overturn his June 24 GOP runoff loss to U.S. Sen. Thad Cochran. The party said McDaniel would do better taking his challenge to court....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mississippi's Republican Party on Wednesday refused to hear challenger Chris McDaniel's effort to overturn his June 24 GOP runoff loss to U.S. Sen. Thad Cochran. The party said McDaniel would do better taking his challenge to court.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Tells New York Bank to Hold Onto Argentine Bond Funds
headline.main: U.S. Judge Tells New York Bank to Hold Onto Argentine Bond Funds

docs.snippet: The U.S. judge in charge of Argentina's debt default case on Wednesday ordered Bank of New York Mellon to hold on to money deposited by the government rather than disburse the funds to holders of the country's restructured bonds....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. judge in charge of Argentina's debt default case on Wednesday ordered Bank of New York Mellon to hold on to money deposited by the government rather than disburse the funds to holders of the country's restructured bonds.

headline.print_headline: No Takeover, So T-Mobile Taunts Sprint
headline.main: No Merger of Sprint and T-Mobile US, but Plenty of Taunts

docs.snippet: When Sprint officially announced on Wednesday that it had abandoned its plans to buy T-Mobile, John J. Legere, chief executive of T-Mobile, had plenty to say....
docs.abstract: When Sprint officially announced on Wednesday that it had abandoned its plans to buy T-Mobile, John J. Legere, chief executive of T-Mobile, had plenty to say.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and BRIAN X. CHEN

headline.print_headline: Revel Casino Bankruptcy Auction Postponed a Week
headline.main: Revel Casino Bankruptcy Auction Postponed a Week

docs.snippet: The bankruptcy auction of the Revel Casino Hotel that was scheduled for Thursday has been postponed until next week because lawyers need more time to review the bids made on the casino....
docs.lead_paragraph: The bankruptcy auction of the Revel Casino Hotel that was scheduled for Thursday has been postponed until next week because lawyers need more time to review the bids made on the casino.

headline.main: High and Dry in Pot Country

docs.snippet: California’s drought is affecting agriculture including marijuana. Illegal growers are being blamed for stolen water and environmental damage. Small-scale farmers say the crop can be grown green....
docs.lead_paragraph: California’s drought is affecting agriculture including marijuana. Illegal growers are being blamed for stolen water and environmental damage. Small-scale farmers say the crop can be grown green.

headline.print_headline: Jewish Children Threatened on Sydney School Bus
headline.main: Jewish Children Threatened on Sydney School Bus

docs.snippet: Dozens of Jewish children have been traumatized by a gang of teenagers who stormed a Sydney school bus and allegedly hurled racial abuse and threats....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of Jewish children have been traumatized by a gang of teenagers who stormed a Sydney school bus and allegedly hurled racial abuse and threats.

headline.print_headline: Canadian Couple Set Up Agency to Help Fund North Korean Aid Trips: Friend
headline.main: Canadian Couple Set Up Agency to Help Fund North Korean Aid Trips: Friend

docs.snippet: A Canadian couple detained in China amid spying allegations made regular trips to deliver goods to North Korea, their close friend and pastor said on Wednesday, and set up a British Columbia-based organization to collect funds for their work....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Canadian couple detained in China amid spying allegations made regular trips to deliver goods to North Korea, their close friend and pastor said on Wednesday, and set up a British Columbia-based organization to collect funds for their work.

headline.print_headline: Cabin Stowaway Caught After Flying to Los Angeles on Commercial Flight
headline.main: Cabin Stowaway Caught After Flying to Los Angeles on Commercial Flight

docs.snippet: A ticketless traveler managed to sneak aboard a commercial flight undetected at the San Jose International Airport and fly to Los Angeles in at least the second major security breach involving a stowaway there this year, authorities said on Wednes...
docs.lead_paragraph: A ticketless traveler managed to sneak aboard a commercial flight undetected at the San Jose International Airport and fly to Los Angeles in at least the second major security breach involving a stowaway there this year, authorities said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: US Judge Detains Okla. Teen on Child Abuse Charges
headline.main: US Judge Detains Okla. Teen on Child Abuse Charges

docs.snippet: An Oklahoma teen facing a three-count indictment that accuses him of sexually abusing children at an orphanage in Kenya was ordered by a federal judge Wednesday to be detained until his trial....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma teen facing a three-count indictment that accuses him of sexually abusing children at an orphanage in Kenya was ordered by a federal judge Wednesday to be detained until his trial.
